class  WorkerTaskObtainer

Detailed Description

The generic worker tasks runs on a lower priority than the rest of the system and applications can submit work packages (= threadlets) to the input queue of this task. The queue will be treated as FIFO queue. While the threadlet is executed, the application can decide to wait synchronously by the active wait mechanism (see AppContainer::Wait()) or just start the threadlet asynchronously.
See also:
Threadlet

BOOLEAN GenericWorkerTask::IsBusy (   )  const
 

Returns:
TRUE, if the GenericWorkerTask is busy at the moment. Busy means, that the list of Threadlets is not empty.
